reviewText: I remembered seeing this show on A&E when it orginally ran.  I saw the opportunity to get it on DVD so I purchased it to add to my JFK Assassination collection.  Anderson's assertion has been borne out by other researchers.  I recommend to anyone old enough, or interested enough, to want the truth of the JFK Assassination.  REM
Jack Anderson was well connected to informants as a reporter and this video (if you listen very closely) has some very interesting concepts from Jack.
